briefTitle: The Technical Operations And Standard Clinical Application Protocol of CBBCT in Diagnostic Process of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Technical Operations And Standard Clinical Application Protocol of Cone Beam Breast CT in Diagnostic Process of Breast Cancer
conditions: The Clinical Application Guide of Conebeam Breast CT
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Standardize the routine scanning and application criteria of CBBCT.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female, older than 35 years. Already have mammography, or other standard exams (ultrasound, MRI, etc). Could participate this trial within 2 weeks after mammography. Have the ability of consent inform.

Exclusion Criteria:

* During pregnancy or lactation period. Patients that may not be capable of prone position, such as patients with scapulohumeral periarthritis, cardiac pacemaker or have recent cardiac surgery.

Lymphoma patients that under therapy. Severe scoliosis.
